definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
the Great Hall of the People in Beijing
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4 Chang2 wu4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 全國人民代表大會常務委員會

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wei2 wu2 er3 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4
Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Da4 hui4
Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4

definition: (Chinese) National People's Congress/abbr. to 人大[Ren2 da4]
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4

definition: national general congress/Communist party national congress, in recent times every five years
pinyin: quan2 guo2 dai4 biao3 da4 hui4
da4 hui4 bao4 gao4 qi3 cao3 ren2
nian2 du4 gu3 dong1 da4 hui4

sentences.english: The mochi-making assembly is an annual tradition of the Yamaguchi-gumi.
sentences.chinese: 搗麻糬大會是山口組每年的慣例。

sentences.english: Muammar al-Qaddafi, making his first appearance despite 40 years in power.
sentences.chinese: 這也是卡扎菲執政40年來首次參加聯大會議。

sentences.english: The convention starts September 1 in St. Paul, Minnesota.
sentences.chinese: 大會定於9月1日在明尼蘇達州聖保羅市開幕。

sentences.english: The reorganization plan of the enterprise shall be discussed by the congress of the staff and workers of the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 企業整頓方案應當經過企業職工代表大會討論。

sentences.english: During his speech he pointed out the 3 root reasons for why Chinese are not good at communication.
sentences.chinese: 吳建民指出，“中國人不大會交流”有三個根本原因。

sentences.english: Drinks Station will be located at Run Course and Event Center.
sentences.chinese: 大會將於跑步賽段及賽事中心設置水站。

sentences.english: Opening ceremony of the 2011 Summer Camp at the Guangxi - Great Hall of the People.
sentences.chinese: 在南寧市的廣西人民大會堂舉行開營儀式。

sentences.english: Size 5 footballs which provided by the Organiser should be used in all matches.
sentences.chinese: 所有賽事均使用由大會提供之五號足球作賽。

sentences.english: The leader criticized him in the meeting for the whole staff, hoping to caution others.
sentences.chinese: 領導在全體職工大會上批評他，目的是以一儆百。

sentences.english: This congress reflects the unprecedented unity of writers and artists throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 這次大會，標誌着全國文藝工作者的空前團結。

sentences.english: After this presentation, we'll have lunch, which is served in the main conference hall.
sentences.chinese: 推介會之後，我們喫午飯，午飯在大會廳內。

sentences.english: At least one-thousand protesters rallied for the final day of the convention.
sentences.chinese: 在大會的最後一天，至少有一千名抗議者舉行集會。

sentences.english: The meeting ended up with the singing of Auld Lang Syne.
sentences.chinese: 大會以唱“友誼地久天長”結束。

sentences.english: The highest decision-making body of YBAM calls for a National Convention biennially .
sentences.chinese: 馬佛青最高決策機構爲每兩年召開的全國代表大會。

sentences.english: Delaying pregnancy can decrease the likelihood that you'll be able to conceive.
sentences.chinese: 年齡過大會導致受精能力下降。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon sent a congratulatory message to the conference.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國祕書長潘基文向大會發來賀信。

definition: to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
to organize/to host (a conference or sports event)
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
